content: crocheted lacy hoop earrings by gene saunders a k a crochetdad put a new look on hoop earrings the hoops shown are 2¼ inch white with 3 rounds see instructions and 2½ inch black done with 4 rounds materials used small amount of #10 crochet cotton #7 steel crochet hook hoop earrings - those pictured are 2¼ inches and 2½ inches across instructions round 1 make a loop around the hoop and single_crochet around to cover the hoop crocheting over the loose end for several stitches will eliminate sewing it in later you can cover the hoop completely or to your taste round 2 turn do not chain 1 skip first chain * single_crochet in next chain skip two chain single_crochet in next chain repeat from * you should do these single_crochet s a little loose to reach the next st round 3 turn skip first st * single_crochet in next st skip 1 st repeat from * around round 4 turn skip first st * slip_stitch in next st skip next st repeat around at this point you can fasten_off and sew in the loose end or add another round the white hoops above were done with 3 rounds and the black hoops were done with 4 rounds the more rounds you add the lacier the look becomes enjoy copyright © 2008 gene saunders a k a crochetdad permission from the author to reproduce is required for redistribution
